00048 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 #if (LIBCFG_OPA_V2)
00050 /** @defgroup OPA_Exported_Types OPA exported types
00051   * @{
00052   */
00053 /**
00054  * @brief Definition of CMP init structure.
00055  */
00056 typedef struct
00057 {
00058   u32 OPA_ScalerEnable;
00059   u32 OPA_ExternalPinEnable;
00060   #if (LIBCFG_OPA_PGA)
00061   u32 OPA_PGAEnable;
00062   u32 OPA_UnitGainEnable;
00063   u32 OPA_PGAGain;
00064   #endif
00065 } OPA_InitTypeDef;
00066 /**
00067  * @brief Enumeration of OPA PGA Gain.
00068  */
00069 typedef enum
00070 {
00071   /* OPnPGA = 1, OPnDACEN = 0                                                                               */
00072   PGA_GAIN_6  = 0x0,
00073   PGA_GAIN_8  = 0x1,
00074   PGA_GAIN_12 = 0x2,
00075   PGA_GAIN_16 = 0x3,
00076   PGA_GAIN_24 = 0x4,
00077   PGA_GAIN_32 = 0x5,
00078   PGA_GAIN_48 = 0x6,
00079   PGA_GAIN_64 = 0x7,
00080 
00081   /* OPnPGA = 1, OPnDACEN = 1                                                                               */
00082   PGA_GAIN_5  = 0x0,
00083   PGA_GAIN_7  = 0x1,
00084   PGA_GAIN_11 = 0x2,
00085   PGA_GAIN_15 = 0x3,
00086   PGA_GAIN_23 = 0x4,
00087   PGA_GAIN_31 = 0x5,
00088   PGA_GAIN_47 = 0x6,
00089   PGA_GAIN_63 = 0x7,
00090 } OPA_PGA_Enum;
00091 /**
00092   * @}
00093   */
00094 #endif
00095 
00096 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00097 /** @defgroup OPA_Exported_Constants OPA exported constants
00098   * @{
00099   */
00100 #define OPA_UNPROTECT_KEY                         (0x9C3A)
00101 
00102 #if (LIBCFG_OPA1)
00103 #define IS_OPA1(PERIPH)                           (PERIPH == HT_OPA1)
00104 #else
00105 #define IS_OPA1(PERIPH)                           (0)
00106 #endif
00107 #define IS_OPA(PERIPH)                            ((PERIPH == HT_OPA0) || IS_OPA1(PERIPH))
00108 
00109 #if (LIBCFG_OPA_V2)
00110 /* Definitions of OPA DAC Enable Bit                                                                        */
00111 #define OPA_SCALER_ENABLE                         ((u32)0x00000100)
00112 #define OPA_SCALER_DISABLE                        ((u32)0x00000000)
00113 
00114 /* Definitions of OPA External Pin Enable Bit                                                               */
00115 #define OPA_ExternalPin_ENABLE                    ((u32)0x00000008)
00116 #define OPA_ExternalPin_DISABLE                   ((u32)0x00000000)
00117 
00118 /* Definitions of OPA PGA Enable Bit                                                                        */
00119 #define OPA_PGA_ENABLE                            ((u32)0x00000004)
00120 #define OPA_PGA_DISABLE                           ((u32)0x00000000)
00121 
00122 /* Definitions of OPA UnitGain Enable Bit                                                                   */
00123 #define OPA_UNITGAIN_ENABLE                       ((u32)0x00000002)
00124 #define OPA_UNITGAIN_DISABLE                      ((u32)0x00000000)
00125 
00126 /* Definitions of OPA Output Status                                                                         */
00127 #define OPA_OUTPUT_HIGH                           ((u32)0x00000080)
00128 #define OPA_OUTPUT_LOW                            ((u32)0x00000000)
00129 
00130 #define OPA_NORMAL_MODE                           (0)
00131 #define OPA_OFFSET_CALIBRATION_MODE               (1)
00132 
00133 #define OPA_INPUT_OFFSET_INN                      (0)
00134 #define OPA_INPUT_OFFSET_INP                      (1)
00135 
00136 /**
00137  * @brief Used to check parameter of the OPAx.
00138  */
00139 #define IS_OPA_ScalerEnable(x)                    ((x == OPA_SCALER_ENABLE) || (x == OPA_SCALER_DISABLE))
00140 
00141 #define IS_OPA_ExtPinEnable(x)                    ((x == OPA_ExternalPin_ENABLE) || (x == OPA_ExternalPin_DISABLE))
00142 
00143 #define IS_OPA_PGAEnable(x)                       ((x == OPA_PGA_ENABLE) || (x == OPA_PGA_DISABLE))
00144 
00145 #define IS_OPA_UnitGainEnable(x)                  ((x == OPA_UNITGAIN_ENABLE) || (x == OPA_UNITGAIN_DISABLE))
00146 
00147 #define IS_OPA_PGA_SEL(SEL)                       ((SEL == PGA_GAIN_5)  || (SEL == PGA_GAIN_6)  || \
00148                                                    (SEL == PGA_GAIN_7)  || (SEL == PGA_GAIN_8)  || \
00149                                                    (SEL == PGA_GAIN_11) || (SEL == PGA_GAIN_12) || \
00150                                                    (SEL == PGA_GAIN_15) || (SEL == PGA_GAIN_16) || \
00151                                                    (SEL == PGA_GAIN_23) || (SEL == PGA_GAIN_24) || \
00152                                                    (SEL == PGA_GAIN_31) || (SEL == PGA_GAIN_32) || \
00153                                                    (SEL == PGA_GAIN_47) || (SEL == PGA_GAIN_48) || \
00154                                                    (SEL == PGA_GAIN_63) || (SEL == PGA_GAIN_64))
00155 
00156 #define IS_OPA_OFMMODE(MODE)                      ((MODE == OPA_OFFSET_CALIBRATION_MODE) || \
00157                                                    (MODE == OPA_NORMAL_MODE))
00158 
00159 #define IS_OPA_INPUTOFFSET_SEL(SEL)               ((SEL == OPA_INPUT_OFFSET_INN) || \
00160                                                    (SEL == OPA_INPUT_OFFSET_INP))
00161 
00162 /* Check the OPA Scaler Value                                                                               */
00163 #define IS_OPA_SCALER_VALUE(x)                    (x <= 0x3FF)
00164 
00165 /* Check the OPA Input Offset Value                                                                         */
00166 #define IS_OPA_INPUTOFFSET_VALUE(x)               (x <= 0x1F)
00167 #endif
00168 /**
00169   * @}
00170   */

00180 void OPA_UnprotectConfig(HT_OPA_TypeDef* HT_OPAn);

00184 void OPA_StructInit(OPA_InitTypeDef* OPA_InitStruct);

00187 void OPA_UnitGainCmd(HT_OPA_TypeDef* HT_OPAn, ControlStatus NewState);

00191 void OPA_ScalerCmd(HT_OPA_TypeDef* HT_OPAn, ControlStatus NewState);
00192 void OPA_SetScalerValue(HT_OPA_TypeDef* HT_OPAn, u32 Scaler_Value);
00193 FlagStatus OPA_GetOutputStatus(HT_OPA_TypeDef* HT_OPAn);
00194 void OPA_OFMMode(HT_OPA_TypeDef* HT_OPAn, u8 bMODE);
00195 void OPA_OFM_InputOffsetReferenceSelect(HT_OPA_TypeDef* HT_OPAn, u8 bSEL);
00196 void OPA_SetInputOffsetVoltage(HT_OPA_TypeDef* HT_OPAn, u8 bData);
00197 #endif
